fields_of_interest: Trade, Enlargement, Energy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
EU Neighbourhood Policy 
EU Trade Policy 
EU Energy Policy 
European External Action Service
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: TUSKON EU is a non-profit, non-political, non-governmental business association. The TUSKON EU works to establish a mutual understanding between the European institutions, Belgian and Turkish private sector and to bring them together to create new synergetic cooperation’s and business opportunities. At the same time, the TUSKON EU aims to provide correct and unbiased information and knowledge about European, Belgian, and Turkish economic, social, political and business affairs. For that, TUSKON EU tries to create its proper communication network with European business organisations, think tanks and EU Institutions.
relevant_communication: We aim to produce publications to fulfill our aims. Also, we aim to meet MEPs, EU Commission officials and all the other relevant officials from EU institutions.
